2090070.name: Paranormal Detective: Escape from the 90s Soundtrack
2090070.description:
The super fly soundtrack to Paranormal Detective: Escape from the 90's!

Enjoy all the music from Paranormal Detective: Escape from the 90's! This includes all your favorite songs from the arcade and beyond! These original tracks were created by Cory Cyr back in the 90's and kept in the vault until now (Robot Rap excluded)! Dance to the infamous Robot Rap (Nexus approved), chill out to these phat tracks, and get jiggy with it all night long!
